类 LuckyNumberGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • LuckyNumberGenerator

  • public class LuckyNumberGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    The LuckyNumberGenerator class is to creat a machine which can create a random integer between 1 and 100. I use the code "Math.random()" to let the system choose the random integer.
    版本:
    Assignment 1 of FIT5131(due day: 12/9/2014)
    作者:
    Jing Guo
